Package burp.api.montoya.http

Interface HttpHandler

public interface HttpHandler
Extensions can implement this interface and then call Http.registerHttpHandler(burp.api.montoya.http.intercept.HttpHandler) to register an HTTP handler. The handler will be notified of requests and responses made and received by any Burp tool. Extensions can perform custom analysis or modification of these messages by registering an HTTP handler.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    RequestResult
    handleHttpRequest(OutgoingHttpRequest outgoingRequest)
    This method is invoked by Burp when an HTTP request is about to be issued.
    ResponseResult
    handleHttpResponse(IncomingHttpResponse incomingResponse)
    This method is invoked by Burp when an HTTP response has been received.

  • Method Details

    • handleHttpRequest

      RequestResult handleHttpRequest(OutgoingHttpRequest outgoingRequest)
      This method is invoked by Burp when an HTTP request is about to be issued.
      Parameters:
      outgoingRequest - information about the HTTP request that is going to be sent.
      Returns:
      An instance of RequestResult.

    • handleHttpResponse

      ResponseResult handleHttpResponse(IncomingHttpResponse incomingResponse)
      This method is invoked by Burp when an HTTP response has been received.
      Parameters:
      incomingResponse - information about HTTP response that was received.
      Returns:
      An instance of ResponseResult.
